text:
{"fixed_xml":"<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ITEM>
    <TRANSACTION>
        <PARTY>
            <NAME>Herrn Johannes Meyer</NAME>
            <PROFESSION>Buchdrucker</PROFESSION>
            <LOCATION>beym Herrn Pullich</LOCATION>
            <ADDITIONAL_INFO>dem Kammmacher an der Gerbergaße</ADDITIONAL_INFO>
        </PARTY>
        <PRODUCTS>
            <PRODUCT>
                <BIBL>
                    <TITLE>Gicht- Fieber-Gifft-Cathar- und Brust-auflösende, bewährte und berühmte, Hochbargische, Berner ner-Schweitzer-Thee</TITLE>
                    <PACKAGING>Paquet</PACKAGING>
                    <PRICE>
                        <VALUE>8</VALUE>
                        <CURRENCY>Rappen</CURRENCY>
                    </PRICE>
                </BIBL>
            </PRODUCT>
            <PRODUCT>
                <BIBL>
                    <TITLE>berühmte Hochbargische Berner-Blümlein- und Brust-Thee</TITLE>
                    <PACKAGING>Paquet</PACKAGING>
                    <PRICE>
                        <VALUE>12</VALUE>
                        <CURRENCY>Rappen</CURRENCY>
                    </PRICE>
                </BIBL>
            </PRODUCT>
            <PRODUCT>
                <BIBL>
                    <TITLE>säuft-kühlenden Fluß-Rauch-Taback</TITLE>
                    <PACKAGING>Paquet</PACKAGING>
                    <PRICE>
                        <VALUE>12</VALUE>
                        <CURRENCY>Rappen</CURRENCY>
                    </PRICE>
                </BIBL>
            </PRODUCT>
            <PRODUCT>
                <BIBL>
                    <TITLE>Schneeberger Haupt-Fluß-Schnupf-Pulver</TITLE>
                    <PACKAGING>Lödlin</PACKAGING>
                    <PRICE>
                        <VALUE>12</VALUE>
                        <CURRENCY>Rappen</CURRENCY>
                    </PRICE>
                </BIBL>
            </PRODUCT>
        </PRODUCTS>
        <ADDITIONAL_PRODUCTS>
            <PRODUCT>
                <BIBL>
                    <TITLE>Roman-Larier-Pillen</TITLE>
                    <DESCRIPTION>welche berühmt sind, die angesetzte Geschwulst und Brust-Wassersucht aufzulösen und auszuführen</DESCRIPTION>
                    <PACKAGING>Prise</PACKAGING>
                    <PRICE>
                        <VALUE>10</VALUE>
                        <CURRENCY>xr.</CURRENCY>
                    </PRICE>
                </BIBL>
            </PRODUCT>
            <PRODUCT>
                <BIBL>
                    <TITLE>berühmte Stahls-Haupt-Pillen</TITLE>
                    <DESCRIPTION>so ein sicheres Mittel für ungesunde Luft und böse Fieber, reinigen den Leib wundersamlich und gelind</DESCRIPTION>
                    <PACKAGING>Lödlin</PACKAGING>
                    <PRICE>
                        <VALUE>12</VALUE>
                        <CURRENCY>xr.</CURRENCY>
                    </PRICE>
                </BIBL>
            </PRODUCT>
            <PRODUCT>
                <BIBL>
                    <TITLE>bewährtes Kropf-Pulver</TITLE>
                    <PACKAGING>Paquet</PACKAGING>
                    <PRICE>
                        <VALUE>12</VALUE>
                        <CURRENCY>xr.</CURRENCY>
                    </PRICE>
                </BIBL>
            </PRODUCT>
            <PRODUCT>
                <BIBL>
                    <TITLE>rarer delieater Orientalischer Blumen-Thee</TITLE>
                    <DESCRIPTION>dieser löst und trocknet sonderheitlich alle kalte und schädliche Fieber-Fluß bei alten flüssigen Personen</DESCRIPTION>
                    <PACKAGING>
                        <TYPE>Prob</TYPE>
                        <PRICE>
                            <VALUE>6</VALUE>
                            <CURRENCY>xr.</CURRENCY>
                        </PRICE>
                    </PACKAGING>
                    <PACKAGING>
                        <TYPE>Viertel-Pfund</TYPE>
                        <PRICE>
                            <VALUE>2</VALUE>
                            <CURRENCY>fl.</CURRENCY>
                        </PRICE>
                    </PACKAGING>
                </BIBL>
            </PRODUCT>
            <PRODUCT>
                <BIBL>
                    <TITLE>extra wohlriechender Orientalischer Cephalique oder Blümlein-Taback</TITLE>
                    <DESCRIPTION>löst auf das verstockte Geblüt und Fieber im Haupt</DESCRIPTION>
                    <PACKAGING>Paquet</PACKAGING>
                    <PRICE>
                        <VALUE>6</VALUE>
                        <RANGE>–</RANGE>
                        <VALUE>12</VALUE>
                        <CURRENCY>xr.</CURRENCY>
                    </PRICE>
                </BIBL>
            </PRODUCT>
            <PRODUCT>
                <BIBL>
                    <TITLE>Orientalischer extra wohlriechender grenierter Blümlein-Taback</TITLE>
                    <DESCRIPTION>dieser löst auf alle versteckte Hauptfluß mit einer subtilen durchdringenden Kraft</DESCRIPTION>
                    <PACKAGING>Paquet</PACKAGING>
                    <PRICE>
                        <VALUE>2</VALUE>
                        <RANGE>–</RANGE>
                        <VALUE>3</VALUE>
                        <CURRENCY>fl.</CURRENCY>
                    </PRICE>
                </BIBL>
            </PRODUCT>
            <PRODUCT>
                <BIBL>
                    <TITLE>noch ein sonder wohlfeiler extra wohlriechender Blümlein-Taback</TITLE>
                    <DESCRIPTION>welcher fast gleiche Wirckung wie obiger hat</DESCRIPTION>
                    <PACKAGING>Loth</PACKAGING>
                    <PRICE>
                        <VALUE>2</VALUE>
                        <CURRENCY>fl.</CURRENCY>
                    </PRICE>
                </BIBL>
            </PRODUCT>
        </ADDITIONAL_PRODUCTS>
        <NOTES>Jedem Stück ist ein gedruckter Bericht beigefügt.</NOTES>
    </TRANSACTION>
</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":25,"explanation":"1. Added XML declaration.
2. Structured the document with a coherent hierarchy: <ITEM>, <TRANSACTION>, <PARTY>, <PRODUCTS>, <PRODUCT>, <BIBL>, <PRICE>, <DESCRIPTION>, and <PACKAGING> tags.
3. Fixed and standardized the titles and descriptions, which were incorrectly nested or missing tags.
4. Separated the initial products from additional products using <PRODUCTS> and <ADDITIONAL_PRODUCTS> tags.
5. Added <PARTY> tag to describe the seller's information.
6. Created <PRICE> tags with <VALUE> and <CURRENCY> sub-tags for consistent pricing information.
7. Added <PACKAGING> tags with <TYPE> sub-tags to describe the packaging of each product.
8. Added <DESCRIPTION> tags for product descriptions that were previously missing or incorrectly placed.
9. Fixed and standardized abbreviations and special characters (e.g., 'xr.', 'fl.', 'Lödlin').
10. Added <NOTES> tag for additional information about the products.
11. Corrected and standardized the formatting of currency and pricing ranges.
12. Ensured all tags are properly closed and nested correctly."}

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ITEM>

            <PRODUCT>
                <BIBL>

parsed.explanation:
1. Added XML declaration.
2. Structured the document with a coherent hierarchy: <ITEM>, <TRANSACTION>, <PARTY>, <PRODUCTS>, <PRODUCT>, <BIBL>, <PRICE>, <DESCRIPTION>, and <PACKAGING> tags.
3. Fixed and standardized the titles and descriptions, which were incorrectly nested or missing tags.
4. Separated the initial products from additional products using <PRODUCTS> and <ADDITIONAL_PRODUCTS> tags.
5. Added <PARTY> tag to describe the seller's information.
6. Created <PRICE> tags with <VALUE> and <CURRENCY> sub-tags for consistent pricing information.
7. Added <PACKAGING> tags with <TYPE> sub-tags to describe the packaging of each product.
8. Added <DESCRIPTION> tags for product descriptions that were previously missing or incorrectly placed.
9. Fixed and standardized abbreviations and special characters (e.g., 'xr.', 'fl.', 'Lödlin').
10. Added <NOTES> tag for additional information about the products.
11. Corrected and standardized the formatting of currency and pricing ranges.
12. Ensured all tags are properly closed and nested correctly.
